column4: hi, can someone give me a little assistance re. the touchpad on my laptop
i've been checking out gsynaptics, but my xorg.conf file doesn't say anything about the synaptics driver, even though it's installed
The closest the xorg.conf file gets to talking about the touchpad is as follows:
updated the "InputDevice" section for your touchpad. Change the Driver to "synaptics"
i can paste you my section if you want iehova
okay iehova, tell me a paste site other than pastebin. it's giving me errors
erk... i don't know. I'll try restarting X anyway, see if that still works.
